restaurants.name: The Garden Bistro
restaurants.description: A charming eatery nestled in a lush urban garden, offering fresh and organic dishes. The bistro focuses on farm-to-table dining, with an emphasis on seasonal ingredients.

menu.name: Harvest Salad
menu.description: A mix of fresh greens, roasted root vegetables, quinoa, and a citrus vinaigrette.

menu.name: Grilled Vegetable Panini
menu.description: Sourdough bread filled with grilled zucchini, bell peppers, mozzarella, and basil pesto.

menu.name: Lentil Stew
menu.description: Hearty lentil stew with tomatoes, carrots, and a blend of aromatic spices.

restaurants.name: Oceanic Delights
restaurants.description: A coastal-themed seafood restaurant with a laid-back atmosphere. Known for its fresh catch and creative seafood dishes.

menu.name: Seaside Paella
menu.description: A traditional Spanish paella with shrimp, mussels, calamari, and saffron rice.

menu.name: Lobster Bisque
menu.description: Creamy bisque made with fresh lobster, sherry, and a hint of cayenne pepper.

menu.name: Grilled Mahi-Mahi
menu.description: Mahi-mahi fillet grilled to perfection, served with mango salsa and jasmine rice.

restaurants.name: The Spice Route
restaurants.description: An exotic restaurant offering a fusion of flavors from across Asia. The menu features a mix of Indian, Thai, and Indonesian dishes.

menu.name: Mango Chicken Curry
menu.description: Tender chicken pieces in a creamy mango and coconut curry sauce, served with basmati rice.

menu.name: Pad Thai
menu.description: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, bean sprouts, and a tamarind sauce.

menu.name: Bali Satay
menu.description: Grilled chicken skewers marinated in a blend of Indonesian spices, served with peanut sauce.

menu.name: Coconut Shrimp Soup
menu.description: A fragrant soup with coconut milk, shrimp, lemongrass, and galangal.

restaurants.name: Pasta Fresca
restaurants.description: An Italian trattoria specializing in homemade pasta dishes. The restaurant prides itself on traditional recipes passed down through generations.

menu.name: Tagliatelle Bolognese
menu.description: Fresh tagliatelle pasta with a rich and hearty Bolognese sauce.

menu.name: Mushroom Risotto
menu.description: Creamy Arborio rice with porcini mushrooms, Parmesan, and truffle oil.

menu.name: Caprese Salad
menu.description: Fresh mozzarella, vine-ripened tomatoes, basil, and a drizzle of balsamic reduction.

menu.name: Tiramisu
menu.description: Classic Italian dessert with layers of mascarpone cream, coffee-soaked ladyfingers, and cocoa powder.

restaurants.name: Urban Grill
restaurants.description: A contemporary steakhouse with a modern twist, offering premium cuts of meat and innovative sides. The ambiance is chic and sophisticated.

menu.name: Ribeye Steak
menu.description: 12 oz. ribeye grilled to your liking, served with garlic mashed potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

menu.name: Truffle Fries
menu.description: Crispy fries tossed in truffle oil and Parmesan cheese.

menu.name: Grilled Asparagus
menu.description: Fresh asparagus spears grilled and topped with a lemon butter sauce.

restaurants.name: Sweet Haven
restaurants.description: A cozy dessert café offering a wide range of pastries, cakes, and artisanal ice creams. The perfect spot for a sweet treat or a relaxing afternoon tea.

menu.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
menu.description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey center, served with vanilla ice cream.

menu.name: Berry Tart
menu.description: A buttery tart crust filled with vanilla custard and topped with fresh berries.

menu.name: Matcha Green Tea Ice Cream
menu.description: Creamy ice cream with a rich matcha flavor, served in a waffle cone.

menu.name: Macarons Assortment
menu.description: A selection of colorful macarons in various flavors, including raspberry, pistachio, and chocolate.
